sentence.Network_en: The development of modern FT - IR spectrographic technique rendered it more easy.
sentence.Network_cn: 而现代FT-IR红外光谱技术的快速发展,使样品分析变得容易多了.

sentence.Network_en: Spectrographic oil analysis technology has been used in the condition monitoring of diesel engines.
sentence.Network_cn: 机油光谱分析技术已广泛用于内燃机车柴油机的磨损状态监测.

sentence.Network_en: The different determinations of calcium are aqueous titration , voltammetry, optical spectrographic method, ion chromatography, et al.
sentence.Network_cn: 钙离子的测定则有滴定法, 伏安法, 光谱法, 离子色谱法等不同方法.
